is protect the ARK... my bosses don't like that anything happen it 
until it was time to Autobots to wake up "

my

this

will 
> > touch  the ark until time comes... So you can leave this place, 
I'

> 
> Maxima's optics glanced over to see Quetzalcoatl. Her crimson 
optics bearing 
> at him with a more than serious look. 
> 
> "I believe it best that we all leave this area, but leave Teletran 
1's 
> defenses on full. The Ark is not the only ship to protect. The Ark 
may have our 
> comrades, but the Nemesis also has other treasures & power sources 
any demented 
> being may attempt to get their hands upon if they know the 
location of the 
> Nemesis." She then turned to Kup. "Remember, the Heart of 
Cybertron is in the 
> Nemesis. That is a major concern. I'm sure you are well aware of 
the Heart's 
> power."
